cons: A high intake of saturated fat can increase the risk of diabetes, obesity, and cardiovascular problems. Moderation is the key.
name: Cheese
pros: Cheese is delicious and nutritious food.
Cheese contains nutrients like calcium, protein, phosphorus, zinc, vitamin A and vitamin B12.
The high-quality protein in cheese provides the body with essential building blocks for strong muscles.
For lactose intolerant, many kinds of cheese, such as Cheddar and Swiss, contain little or no lactose.
serving: Nutritional value per slice (1 oz)(28 g)
